snippet: The international law firm Clifford Chance plans to announce on Wednesday that it has hired two Dewey & LeBoeuf mergers lawyers as it seeks to bolster its deal-making team.
abstract: The international law firm Clifford Chance plans to announce on Wednesday that it has hired two Dewey & LeBoeuf mergers lawyers as it seeks to bolster its deal-making team.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Clifford Chance Hires 2 Dewey & LeBoeuf Deal Makers
